description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=3/3, Mature Content=0/3. Dragoon is a weapon-based versus fighting game. Using 3D graphics and old-style controls. Dragoon: An exhibition match given by the hunting people who lives with dragons. Contestants wield a large weapon for their hunting. Dragoon © 2008-2010 XELF http://xelf.info/
